Vegas mogul Steve Wynn pursuing Everett casino site

Wynn is investigating land on the Mystic River for a possible casino bid, setting up a potential clash among gambling titans for a lucrative license. (Boston Globe)
  • 12/27/11 Foxborough selectmen deal blow to Wynn plan

Pioneering organ transplant surgeon dies

Dr. Joseph E. Murray, 93, the Nobel laureate who conducted the world's first successful organ transplant, died Monday at the very same Boston hospital where he first performed the pioneering surgery. (Boston Globe)
  • pictures More notable deaths from 2012

Massachusetts fails to crack top 10 for high school graduation rates in US

The state also had among the lowest graduation rates in New England, according to data released by the US Education Department. (Boston Globe)

Doctors: Menino has type 2 diabetes

Doctors say diabetes reduces the body's ability to fight infection, and the Boston mayor's condition may have been a factor leading to his back infection. (Boston Globe)
